snippet.title: Meanings hidden in plain sight - Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Meanings hidden in plain sight is an upcoming and new, captivating word-guessing game where quick wit and sharp observation skills are your greatest assets. Look at an image, think quick, find the hidden meanings and grab the points for solving them!

Wishlist now on Steam to be notified when the game releases!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3162290/Meanings_hidden_in_plain_sight/?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=web&utm_campaign=presale

Either play in PvP mode designed for Twitch, where quick wit and sharp observation skills are your greatest assets. Compete in real-time live with other players as you decipher hidden meanings in a series of images, trying to be the first to find a meaning to get the points for it.
Prefer a more relaxed approach? Fret not, go and test your wit in singleplayer mode where you play just for your fun. Either way, you'll see lots of carefully curated images, all captured by the developer. Each round presents a new image, challenging you to spot and guess the meanings that hide within.
